attributes.action: Work out to help out, help our gyms and the fitness industry.
attributes.additional_details: Because the fitness industry is important to us all helping people stay active, helping peoples mental health ,and giving us a little bit of us time, away from work ,away from problems ,away from family ,your own space and time for you.
attributes.background: WORK OUT TO HELP OUT. Why isn't this a thing, you are encouraged to stay fit and active during lockdown, cheeseburger 50p. lets help people to pay for gyms pay for Bootcamp, swimming, general fitness support gyms and the whole of the fitness industry, because at the minute gyms are closing fast.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332902
